name: Robotic
description: Race is robotic. It makes it immune to some biological effects and leaders cannot die from old age.

name: Lithovoric
description: Eats minerals instead of food. This life-long bond with earth consquently results in talent for mining.

name: Powered
description: Consumes energy credits instead of food at a rate of 1 credit per 4 population.

name: No heirs
description: Race has unusual birth process, to which it is not possible to apply concept of parental heritage.

name: Constructed
description: Breeds by external process, where individuals are "constructed" in some way.

name: Radiosynthesis
description: Required sustenance (food) for population is reduced by 1 per existing population up to planet's radiation points.

name: Mercantile
description: Receives +1 additional credit from each credit-producing building and 50% more from trade routes.

name: Stealthy
description: Natural aptitude towards stealthy movement and actions. Race's ships have 10% cloaking, sharing this trait with their constructors.

name: Eat less
description: Required sustenance (food) for population is 50% less than normal requirement.

name: Fast population growth
description: Population grows 150% faster than normally

name: Slow population growth
description: Population grows 50% slower than normally

name: Fixed maximum population growth
description: Population grows always with fixed speed.

name: Limited maximum population growth
description: Population growth is limited.

name: Slow culture
description: Slow culture speed from artist population.

name: Fast culture
description: Fast culture speed from artist population.

name: Fast research
description: Fast research speed from scientist population.

name: Fast research
description: Very fast research speed from scientist population.

name: Slow research
description: Slow research speed from scientist population.

name: Short life span
description: Short life span for leaders. Leaders live about 10 star years below average.

name: Long life span
description: Long life span for leaders. Leaders live about 10 star years longer than average.

name: Very long life span
description: Very long life span for leaders. Leaders live about 20 star years longer than average.

name: Cyborg life span
description: Cyborgs live exceptionally long life, since those can be repaired.. Leaders live about 70 star years longer than average.

name: Massive size
description: Massive size, that ships are more robust and leaders live a longer life.

name: Slow metabolism
description: Leaders live a longer life due slower metabolism but troops fight with less power.

name: Fast food production
description: Farmers work 100% faster than regular farmers.

name: Assimilation
description: Assimilates non-robotic population as own after conquering a planet, while potentially stealing technology in the process.

name: Good war resilience
description: Population can sustain war 10 extra star years longer without fatigue.

name: Excellent war resilience
description: Population can sustain war 20 extra star years longer without fatigue.

name: Poor war resilience
description: Population can sustain war 10 star years less without fatigue.

name: Weak war resilience
description: Population can sustain war 20 star years less without fatigue.

name: Natural charm
description: Naturally charming, others just tend to like individuals of the race, which makes diplomacy easier for the race.

name: Repulsive
description: Be it because of it's bad looks or habits, others tend to dislike the race. Diplomacy suffers as a consequence.

name: Disgusting
description: Race's habits or appearance are so unnaceptable to other races that race's attempts to do diplomacy are practically futile.

name: Strong
description: Unnaturally strong for it's size. Race's troops are more powerful and mining minerals is easier.

name: Weak
description: Race is weaker than usual. This weakness is negatively impacting it's combat abilities, as well as mining work.

name: Handy
description: Whether it is due to anatomy or cognitive abilities, race exhibits unnatural handiness, benefiting production.

name: Impractical
description: Anatomy or cognitive abilities of the race negatively impact it's production capabilities.

name: Low gravity being
description: Race is use to work in low gravity conditions. Working in normal or high gravity is much more challenging.

name: High gravity being
description: Race is use to work in high gravity conditions. Working in normal or low gravity is much lighter.

name: Zero gravity being
description: Race is use to work in zero gravity conditions. Working in low, normal or high gravity is much more challenging. Race has focus living on orbitals.

name: Radiation intolerant
description: Race does not handle radiation well, and is able tolerate only very small levels of radiation on planets.

name: Tolerate high radiation
description: Race is able to tolerate high radiation on planets.

name: Tolerate extreme radiation
description: Race is able to tolerate extremely high radiation on planets.

name: Tolerate cold temperature
description: Race is able to tolerate cold temperature on planets.

name: Tolerate hot temperature
description: Race is able to tolerate hot temperature on planets.

name: Tolerate volcanic temperature
description: Race is able to tolerate volcanic temperature and lava on planets, but cold temperature causes problems.

name: Communal
description: Race is able to tolerate more dense population. Allows growing 2 extra population to planet.

name: Solitary
description: Race is not able to tolerate dense population. Maximum population is 2 lower than normally.

name: Natural leaders
description: Race has more natural leaders, one less population is required for training a leader.

name: Quick learners
description: Leaders gain twice faster experience.

name: Slow learners
description: Leaders gain only half of experience.
